brand.name: NutriPhilosophy
brand.description: Philosophical support for nutritionists seeking holistic patient treatment

home.question: What is your patient's nutritional challenge?
home.placeholder: Ex: Patient struggling with diet adherence, reports emotional eating when anxious, seeks sustainable weight loss but has history of restrictive diets...
home.description: Describe the patient's context, dietary challenges, and goals. AI will suggest integrative approaches combining clinical nutrition with philosophical principles.

philosophy.thomismDesc: Cardinal virtues, natural order, integral human good
philosophy.mindfulnessDesc: Presence and full attention during meals
philosophy.holisticDesc: Body, mind and spirit in balance

professional.aiPlaceholder: Describe the patient's profile and objectives...

chat.title: Integrative Consultant
chat.subtitle: Ask questions about the suggested approach
chat.placeholder: Ask about the analysis or request more details...
chat.emptyState: Discuss the integrative analysis. Ask how to apply philosophical principles to the patient's case.
